attributes.action: Delete the position of London Mayor.
attributes.additional_details:
The position of mayor is Dictatorial and Not Directly answerable to the electorate Except every 4 Or 5 years. 
what is needed is a collection of views to get what Londoners want and with real consultation that abides by the majority view.
attributes.background: Delete the position of London Mayor and only have an elected GLA with an elected chairperson that only represents the majority of the Elected GLA officials

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the people of London, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for an action that's the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, for example calling for a referendum in London on removing the role of Mayor of London and giving these powers to the London Assembly, if that's something you want to happen.
